title: Verify user can complete exchange transaction through the available hyperlink.

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Login into PV
2. Navigate ticketing->Ticketing sale
3. Lock seats and complete the transcation
4. Navigate to the order and Select ?Exchange? 
from the action dropdown.
5. Select the seats and click ?Apply Action?
6. Enter the event
7. verify that the far right column of the results is 
?Available? which, when selected, will open a 
new box and list price scale and section 
availability for the event.
8. Click ?Select Event?
9. Lock some tickets to navigate to cart
10. Verify that the user is able to complete the 
exchange transcation
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. User should be able to login successfully
2. User should be able to navigating successfully
3. User should be able to complete the transcation
4. Successfully navigating
5. Exchange sale page should be navigating 
successfully
6. Event should be displayed
7. Popup Box should be displayed
8. Event should be selected
9. successfully navigating
10. the user is able to complete the exchange 
transcation

title: Verify whether exchange quantity rule is applied when removing tickets during event exchange sale

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Login into PV
2. Event access  as false: Can Break Exchange Quantity.
Event Access:
Exchange context- Same quantity


3. Complete a single sale
4. Exchange the tickets and lock the same quantity for the above order.
Click "Modify" at the offer and go to tickets view,
Click "X" to remove some tickets,
Verify that the same quantity rule is  applied.

2. Should be completed
3. Should be completed
4. Error [for not satisfying quantity rule]

title: Verify the Delivery forward status on new ticket delivery records    created during online exchange of forwarded ticket is RDS( Received_During_Sale)
custom_preconds: P1, P2 patron should be available

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Login into PV
2.  Purchase ticket for patron P1
3. Navigate to mytixx login and perform forward transaction on the ticket 
4. Verify the ticket_delivery records newly created 
5. Login to Mytixx view of patron  P2 (attending patron )
6. Perform online exchange transaction on the ticket 
7. Verify the ticket_delivery records newly created during the online exchange
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. User should be able to login successfully
2. Success
3. Success
4. RCD should be displayed 
5. Success
6. Success
7. RDS should be populated

title: Verify whether unexpected error is thrown for deferred exchange when user tries toggle between selection guide and seat command

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. A package P should be available with the option 'Allow Deferred Exchange' enabled

(Package Access -> Partial Package Ticket Exchange -> Allow Deferred Partila Package Exchange)
2. Launch PV Application using the link provided
3. Login to the Application using suitable credentials
4. 1.Navigate to Ticket Sales
2.select any patron
3.Select seats of any package and navigate to cart
4.Assigna delivery method
5.Navigate to Receivables tab
6.Create a Receivable for this transaction
7.CHECKOUT the transcation
5. 1.Navigate to Ticket Services
2.Select the option 'Order ID' for the dropdown 'Search Using'
3.Enter the Transcation ID noted above as 'Search Value'
4.Select the Radio button 'Order'
5.Click FIND
6. Click CASH RECEIPT
7. 1.Enter the amounts you are planning to pay for these Receivable in the 'Amount' Text box against these Receivables 
2.select a Note type and enter note
3.Click APPLY
8. 1.Navigate to Payment tab
9. 1.Select the payment method
2.Click ACCEPT PAYMENT
10. 1.Click ADD OFFER
2.Select the package P mentioned in pre Requisite 1
3.Select seats for this package and navigate to cart
11. 1.Navigate to Payment tab
2.Make full payment for the new Package offer in cart
12. Click CHECKOUT
13. 1.Navigate to Ticket Services
2.Select the option 'Order ID' for the dropdown 'Search Using'
3.Enter the Transcation ID noted n previous step as 'Search Value'
4.Select the Radio button 'Order'
5.Click FIND
14. Click the Order ID link for the new package order craeted in step 9
15. 1.Select the option 'Partial 'Exchange' from the 'Select Action' drop down
2.Select few seats of this order
3.Click APPLY ACTION
16. 1.Click DEFER EXCHANGE and get navigated to the cart
2.Navigate to Payment tab
3.Make Payment and complete the transaction
17. 1.Navigate to Ticket Services
2.select the order mentioned in step 13 (order of the package P) for which defer exchange of seats was performed in previous step
3.Select the option 'Complete Deferred Exchange' from the 'Select Action' drop down
4.Seletc the checkbox against the line which corresponding to exchnage deffered seats
5.Click APPLY ACTION
18. 1.Select the event/package with which you wish to exchange the seats and get navigated to the seat selection page
2.Select seats of this event/package
3.Assign a delivery method
4.Make payment and complete the Transaction
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. PV Application should be launched successfully
2. PV Application should be launched successfully
3. Login should be successful
4. Transcation should be completed succesfully with Receivable for the package.

Note down the Transaction ID
5. The Order Details corresponding to this transaction should be displayed
6. User should be navigated to the Receivables tab cart.

User should be now in the sub tab 'Pay' under the Rceivables tab.
7. The Balance amount for these Receivable should get updated accordingly
8. The amounts mentioned in previous step (the amounts entered in the 'Amount' tab under the Receivable tab) should be displayed as the Amount to be paid
9. Payment should be successful
10. User should be navigated to the cart successfully.

The cart should contain the CASH RECEIPT and the new package offer.
Cart Balance should be updated accordingly
11. User should be able to make full payment for this package offer successfully
12. The Transaction should be completed succesfully
13. The two orders corresponding to this transcation should be displayed as search result as two differnt lines
14. User should be navigated to the details page for this new package order with Receivables
15. User should be navigated to the page where he can selecte seats of any event/package with which he wish to exchange the seats

No unexpected Error should be displayed.
16. Defer Exchange should be performed successfully
17. Unexpected error should not be thown.

User should be navigated to the page where he can selecte seats of any event/package with which he wish to exchange the seats
18. Transcation should be completed successfully

(Package Access -> Partial Package Ticket Exchange -> Allow Deferred Partila Package Exchange)
2. Launch PV Application using the link provided
3. Login to the Application using suitable credentials
4. 1.Navigate to Ticket Sales
2.select any patron
3.Select seats of any package and navigate to cart
4.Assigna delivery method
5.Navigate to Receivables tab
6.Create a Receivable for this transaction
7.CHECKOUT the transcation
5. 1.Navigate to Ticket Services
2.Select the option 'Order ID' for the dropdown 'Search Using'
3.Enter the Transcation ID noted above as 'Search Value'
4.Select the Radio button 'Order'
5.Click FIND
6. Click CASH RECEIPT
7. 1.Enter the amounts you are planning to pay for these Receivable in the 'Amount' Text box against these Receivables 
2.select a Note type and enter note
3.Click APPLY
8. 1.Navigate to Payment tab
9. 1.Select the payment method
2.Click ACCEPT PAYMENT
10. 1.Click ADD OFFER
2.Select the package P mentioned in pre Requisite 1
3.Select seats for this package and navigate to cart
11. 1.Navigate to Payment tab
2.Make full payment for the new Package offer in cart
12. Click CHECKOUT
13. 1.Navigate to Ticket Services
2.Select the option 'Order ID' for the dropdown 'Search Using'
3.Enter the Transcation ID noted n previous step as 'Search Value'
4.Select the Radio button 'Order'
5.Click FIND
14. Click the Order ID link for the new package order craeted in step 9
15. 1.Select the option 'Partial 'Exchange' from the 'Select Action' drop down
2.Select few seats of this order
3.Click APPLY ACTION
16. 1.Click DEFER EXCHANGE and get navigated to the cart
2.Navigate to Payment tab
3.Make Payment and complete the transaction
17. 1.Navigate to Ticket Services
2.select the order mentioned in step 13 (order of the package P) for which defer exchange of seats was performed in previous step
3.Select the option 'Complete Deferred Exchange' from the 'Select Action' drop down
4.Seletc the checkbox against the line which corresponding to exchnage deffered seats
5.Click APPLY ACTION
18. 1.Select the event/package with which you wish to exchange the seats and get navigated to the seat selection page
2.Select seats of this event/package
3.Assign a delivery method
4.Make payment and complete the Transaction
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. PV Application should be launched successfully
2. PV Application should be launched successfully
3. Login should be successful
4. Transcation should be completed succesfully with Receivable for the package.

Note down the Transaction ID
5. The Order Details corresponding to this transaction should be displayed
6. User should be navigated to the Receivables tab cart.

User should be now in the sub tab 'Pay' under the Rceivables tab.
7. The Balance amount for these Receivable should get updated accordingly
8. The amounts mentioned in previous step (the amounts entered in the 'Amount' tab under the Receivable tab) should be displayed as the Amount to be paid
9. Payment should be successful
10. User should be navigated to the cart successfully.

The cart should contain the CASH RECEIPT and the new package offer.
Cart Balance should be updated accordingly
11. User should be able to make full payment for this package offer successfully
12. The Transaction should be completed succesfully
13. The two orders corresponding to this transcation should be displayed as search result as two differnt lines
14. User should be navigated to the details page for this new package order with Receivables
15. User should be navigated to the page where he can selecte seats of any event/package with which he wish to exchange the seats

No unexpected Error should be displayed.
16. Defer Exchange should be performed successfully
17. Unexpected error should not be thown.

User should be navigated to the page where he can selecte seats of any event/package with which he wish to exchange the seats
18. Transcation should be completed successfully

title: Verify whether user is not able to complete exchange transaction when target package has no Partial Package access and target event associated to target package has no exchange access

custom_steps_separated.content:

permission
2. Create a target package(future onsale date) with package sales or reservation permission but 
without  package exchange sale permission
3. Complete package sale transaction for source package and note the ticket IDs
2. 1. Launch Rest client API for exchange return api
2. Provide the exchange return api URL
3. Provide the ticket id's in request noted in prerequisite and run the exchange return api
4. Get the cart id, offer id and etag from the exchange return api response
3. 1. Provide the package id,pacakge list id, event id and patron id in the exchange sale api request
2.Run the Exchange sale api request
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. PV Application should be launched successfully
2. Exchange return should be completed successfully
3. Proper error message should be thrown

title: verify whether exchange downgrade fee is recalculated when exchange seat is repriced with a new buyer lesser  than the original price ticket in partail package context while doing  receivable transaction

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. A package P should be available with the option 'Allow Deferred Exchange' enabled

(Package Access -> Partial Package Ticket Exchange -> Allow Deferred Partila Package Exchange)
2. Launch PV Application using the link provided
3. Login to the Application using suitable credentials
4. 1.Navigate to Ticket Sales
2.select any patron
3.Select seats of any package and navigate to cart
4.Assigna delivery method
5.Navigate to Receivables tab
6.Create a Receivable for this transaction
7.CHECKOUT the transcation
5. 1.Navigate to Ticket Services
2.Select the option 'Order ID' for the dropdown 'Search Using'
3.Enter the Transcation ID noted above as 'Search Value'
4.Select the Radio button 'Order'
5.Click FIND
6. Click CASH RECEIPT
7. 1.Enter the amounts you are planning to pay for these Receivable in the 'Amount' Text box against these Receivables 
2.select a Note type and enter note
3.Click APPLY
8. 1.Navigate to Payment tab
9. 1.Select the payment method
2.Click ACCEPT PAYMENT
10. 1.Click ADD OFFER
2.Select the package P mentioned in pre Requisite 1
3.Select seats for this package and navigate to cart
11. 1.Navigate to Payment tab
2.Make full payment for the new Package offer in cart
12. Click CHECKOUT
13. 1.Navigate to Ticket Services
2.Select the option 'Order ID' for the dropdown 'Search Using'
3.Enter the Transcation ID noted n previous step as 'Search Value'
4.Select the Radio button 'Order'
5.Click FIND
14. Click the Order ID link for the new package order craeted in step 9
15. 1.Select the option 'Partial 'Exchange' from the 'Select Action' drop down
2.Select few seats of this order
3.Click APPLY ACTION
16. 1.Click DEFER EXCHANGE and get navigated to the cart
2.Navigate to Payment tab
3.Make Payment and complete the transaction
17. 1.Navigate to Ticket Services
2.select the order mentioned in step 13 (order of the package P) for which defer exchange of seats was performed in previous step
3.Select the option 'Complete Deferred Exchange' from the 'Select Action' drop down
4.Seletc the checkbox against the line which corresponding to exchnage deffered seats
5.Click APPLY ACTION
18. 1.Select the event/package with which you wish to exchange the seats and get navigated to the seat selection page
2.Select seats of this event/package
3.Assign a delivery method
4.Make payment and complete the Transaction
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. PV Application should be launched successfully
2. PV Application should be launched successfully
3. Login should be successful
4. Transcation should be completed succesfully with Receivable for the package.

Note down the Transaction ID
5. The Order Details corresponding to this transaction should be displayed
6. User should be navigated to the Receivables tab cart.

User should be now in the sub tab 'Pay' under the Rceivables tab.
7. The Balance amount for these Receivable should get updated accordingly
8. The amounts mentioned in previous step (the amounts entered in the 'Amount' tab under the Receivable tab) should be displayed as the Amount to be paid
9. Payment should be successful
10. User should be navigated to the cart successfully.

The cart should contain the CASH RECEIPT and the new package offer.
Cart Balance should be updated accordingly
11. User should be able to make full payment for this package offer successfully
12. The Transaction should be completed succesfully
13. The two orders corresponding to this transcation should be displayed as search result as two differnt lines
14. User should be navigated to the details page for this new package order with Receivables
15. User should be navigated to the page where he can selecte seats of any event/package with which he wish to exchange the seats

No unexpected Error should be displayed.
16. Defer Exchange should be performed successfully
17. Unexpected error should not be thown.

User should be navigated to the page where he can selecte seats of any event/package with which he wish to exchange the seats
18. Transcation should be completed successfully

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. A package P should be available with the option 'Allow Deferred Exchange' enabled

(Package Access -> Partial Package Ticket Exchange -> Allow Deferred Partila Package Exchange)
2. Launch PV Application using the link provided
3. Login to the Application using suitable credentials
4. 1.Navigate to Ticket Sales
2.select any patron
3.Select seats of any package and navigate to cart
4.Assigna delivery method
5.Navigate to Receivables tab
6.Create a Receivable for this transaction
7.CHECKOUT the transcation
5. 1.Navigate to Ticket Services
2.Select the option 'Order ID' for the dropdown 'Search Using'
3.Enter the Transcation ID noted above as 'Search Value'
4.Select the Radio button 'Order'
5.Click FIND
6. Click CASH RECEIPT
7. 1.Enter the amounts you are planning to pay for these Receivable in the 'Amount' Text box against these Receivables 
2.select a Note type and enter note
3.Click APPLY
8. 1.Navigate to Payment tab
9. 1.Select the payment method
2.Click ACCEPT PAYMENT
10. 1.Click ADD OFFER
2.Select the package P mentioned in pre Requisite 1
3.Select seats for this package and navigate to cart
11. 1.Navigate to Payment tab
2.Make full payment for the new Package offer in cart
12. Click CHECKOUT
13. 1.Navigate to Ticket Services
2.Select the option 'Order ID' for the dropdown 'Search Using'
3.Enter the Transcation ID noted n previous step as 'Search Value'
4.Select the Radio button 'Order'
5.Click FIND
14. Click the Order ID link for the new package order craeted in step 9
15. 1.Select the option 'Partial 'Exchange' from the 'Select Action' drop down
2.Select few seats of this order
3.Click APPLY ACTION
16. 1.Click DEFER EXCHANGE and get navigated to the cart
2.Navigate to Payment tab
3.Make Payment and complete the transaction
17. 1.Navigate to Ticket Services
2.select the order mentioned in step 13 (order of the package P) for which defer exchange of seats was performed in previous step
3.Select the option 'Complete Deferred Exchange' from the 'Select Action' drop down
4.Seletc the checkbox against the line which corresponding to exchnage deffered seats
5.Click APPLY ACTION
18. 1.Select the event/package with which you wish to exchange the seats and get navigated to the seat selection page
2.Select seats of this event/package
3.Assign a delivery method
4.Make payment and complete the Transaction

title: Verify whether user is able to upgrade seats for large number of tickets

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. 1)Create a new event EVT1
2)Navigate to Event Access tab of above event
3)Select the User and set Seat Upgrade Permission to Ture
4)Click on Apply Changes button
2. Login using valid credentials
3. 1)Navigate to Ticket Sales from Ticketing tab 
2)Select the event EVT1 created in pre-requisites
3)Click on Map button
4. Purchase large number (>1000) of tickets and complete the transaction.
Note the transaction Id
5. 1)Navigate to Ticket Services and select the transaction done in previous step
2)Go to Order view and select the option Seat Upgrade from list
3)Select more than 500 seats and Click on Apply Action button
6. 1)Click on Map button in the sales page
3)Select 500 seats from the map 
4)Click on Add and Go To Cart button
7. Launch PV application.
8. Click on logout link
9. 1)Select delivery method from delivery tab
2)Select the payment method and click on Accept Payment button
3)Click on Checkout button to complete the transacation
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. 
2. The user should be able to login into PV application.
3. Map should get loaded.
4. The transaction should get completed successfully.
5. User should be navigated to sales cart page
6. User able to upgrade seats for large number of tickets and navigated to sales cart page
7. The PV Application should be launched without any issues.
8. User should be successfully logged out of the application
9. User should be successfully completed the exchange transaction

6. The exchange should be deferred successfully

title: Ticket Services User cant exchange group order unless single return or exchange permission is also enabled.

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. 1.Create two new events            
 2.Set Single Ticket Retun access as FALSE in User level and Agency Level in Event Access tab                     
3. Set Single Ticket Exchange access as FALSE in User level and Agency Level in Event Access tab.
2. Login to PV with valid credentials
3. Perform Group Ticket Sale transaction
4. Select Exchange action for a few ticket
5. 1.Set Single Ticket Return access as TRUE in User level and Agency Level in Event Access tab.              
2.Set Single Ticket Exchange access as TRUE in User level and Agency Level in.
6. Repeat Step 4
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. 
2. Login should be successful and the home page of the applcation should be launched
3. User should be able to complete the Group Ticket sale transaction successfully
4. User should not be able to exchange the Group ticket
5. User should be able to set the access
6. User should be able to exchange the Group ticket

title: Unexpected error displayed when user trying to Complete deffered Exchange

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Launch PVNG application
2. Select Event administration from the Ticketing setup menu and create two events.
3. 1.Select Package event list from Ticketing setup menu and create two Package event list.
2.Associate first event with one Package event list
3.Associate second event with the other Package event list
4. 1.Select Packages from Ticketing setup menu and create a new package.
2.Associate both the Package event list to this package.
3.Set Same Quantity for exchange to True
4.Set Force Fixed Quantity to True
5.Set Access Permissions to Allow Break context rules and Allow Break Same Quantity Exchange rule to True
5. Do a Ticket sale for this package.
6. Select Partial Exchange action from the drop down.
2.Select one event and click Apply action.
3. Click on Defer button in Exchange sale page.
4. Complete the Partial defered exchange transaction.
7. Click on Confirmation ID link from the Ticket sale Page.
8. Select Complete Defered exchange from the Action drop down.
9. Click on Logout link
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. PVNG application launched successfully.
2. Both the Events should be created sucessfully.
3. Master Only Package Event list should be created sucessfully.
4. Package should be created sucessfully.
5. Ticket sale Transaction should be completed sucessfully.
6. Partial Defered Transaction should be completed sucessfully.
7. System should navigate to Ticket services.
8. System should not allow the user to select any records. All the Events, package event list, Package should be disabled.
9. PVNG application should be logged out.

title: Perform bundle package exchange sale when Same Quantity under Exchanges section is false and Acess permissions are set to false_Exchange with equal number of seats using map sales

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. 1.Create a bundle package   
2.Note the primary event for the bundle package (event in the first event list) . Let the primary event be PE1                                                                     
3.Set the option Same Quantity under Exchanges section for the primary event to FALSE
4. Go to event Access tab for the primary event and uncheck the field 'Allow break exchange quantity rules'
5.Perform a sales transaction for the bundle package 
6.Note down the Transaction ID
2. Login to the application using the suitable credentials
3. 1. Navigate to the TIcket services portal
2. Search for the above transaction
3. Click the Order ID link
4. Select "Exchange" from Actions dropdown
5.Select all seats of the order
6 Click on Apply action
4. 1.Enter search criteria and search for the event with which seats are to be exchanged.
2.Click the select icon against the the desired event from the search results pane.
Let the selected event be EVTX
5. 1.Click VIEW MAP and navigate to map 
2.Select any section
3.Select equal number of seats and click ADD AND GO TO CART
6. 1.Navigate to DELIVERIES tab
2.select a delivery method and assign it to the seats
7. 1.Navigate to PAYMENT tab
2.Select a payment method 
3.Click APPLY and make payment
8. Click CHECKOUT to complete the transaction
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. The user should be able to complete the Prerequisite
2. The user should be able to login to the application successfully
3. The user should be navigated to the Exchange window where he can select the new event with which seats are to be exchanged
4. User should be navigated to the Ticket sales page with the selected event name displayed in the 'Event' portlet.

The message "From PE1 To EVTX" should be displayed.
5. User should be navigated to cart successfully with the selected seats locked in cart
6. Delivery method should be assigned to the seats successfully
7. Payment should be made successfuly for the seats in cart
8. Exchange sale transaction should get completed successfully.

No error message should be displayed to the user regarding the exchange seat quantity

title: Perform bundle package exchange sale when Same Quantity under Exchanges section is true and Acess permissions are set to false_Exchange with more number of seats using map sales

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. 1.Create a bundle package   
2.Note the primary event for the bundle package (event in the first event list) . Let the primary event be PE1                                                                     
3.Set the option Same Quantity under Exchanges section for the primary event to TRUE
4. Go to event Access tab for the primary event and uncheck the field 'Allow break exchange quantity rules'
5.Perform a sales transaction for the bundle package 
6.Note down the Transaction ID
2. Login to the application using the suitable credentials
3. 1. Navigate to the TIcket services portal
2. Search for the above transaction
3. Click the Order ID link
4. Select "Exchange" from Actions dropdown
5.Select all seats of the order
6 Click on Apply action
4. 1.Enter search criteria and search for the event with which seats are to be exchanged.
2.Click the select icon against the the desired event from the search results pane.
Let the selected event be EVTX
5. 1.Navigate to DELIVERIES tab
2.select a delivery method and assign it to the seats
6. 1.Click VIEW MAP and navigate to map 
2.Select any section
3.Select more number of seats and click ADD AND GO TO CART
7. 1.Navigate to PAYMENT tab
2.Select a payment method 
3.Click APPLY and make payment
8. Click CHECKOUT to complete the transaction
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. The user should be able to complete the Prerequisite
2. The user should be able to login to the application successfully
3. The user should be navigated to the Exchange window where he can select the new event with which seats are to be exchanged
4. User should be navigated to the Ticket sales page with the selected event name displayed in the 'Event' portlet.

The message "From PE1 To EVTX" should be displayed.
Also the message "Same quantity Required" should be displayed
5. Delivery method should be assigned to the seats successfully
6. User should be navigated to cart successfully with the selected seats locked in cart
7. Payment should be made successfuly for the seats in cart
8. Transaction should not get completed.

A message should be displayed to the user mentioning that: 
"Exchanged seat quantity must be same as that of the returned event''

title: Verify whether Exchange of an order with an open receivable requires a $0 payment be applied

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. 1. Launch PV application.
2. Login using valid credentials.
2. 1)Navigate to Ticketing tab and select Ticket Sales portal
2)Search and selct an event
3)Enter no of seats in the seat requested field and click on Lock Seats button
3. 1)Select a patron
2)Select a delivery method and click on Apply button
3)Navigate to Receivables tab and click on Create tab
4)Select Payment plan tab and select any payment paln from the list and click on Build button
5)Select Receivble Type and Note Type
6)Click on Apply Receivables
4. 1)Navigate to Confirm tab and click on Checkout button to complete the transaction
2)Click on Confirmation Id link
5. 1)Navigate to Ticket Services->Order details page of transaction id noted in step 4
2)Select 'Exchange' from the 'Select Action' dropdown.
3)Select some tickets to exchange
4)Click on the 'Apply Action' button.
6. 1)Click on Modify link
2)Select tickets of another buyer type such that the total value in cart remains the same as first order.
3)Click on Reprice button
7. Search and select any event to exchange the seats
8. 1)Enter no of seats and click on Lock Seats button
9. 1)Navigate to Confirm tab and click on Checkout button
2)Verify that user gets an error message
10. Click on Logout link
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. The login should be successful and the 'Home' page of the applicatiuon should be displayed.
2. User should be navigated to shopping cart page.
3. User should be successfully added receivables
4. User should be able to complete the transaction and navigated to ticket Services page
5. User should be navigated to the event search for exchange page
6. User should be succesfully repriced the different buyer type with same cart amount
7. User should be navigated to best availbale page
8. User should be navigated to shopping cart page with status as Exchange
9. User should not be getting an error message and successfully complete the transaction
10. User should be loggged out of the application

title: Perform exchange of reserved tickets after performing partial claim of reservation order created by expansion

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Launch PV Application uisng the link provided
2. Login to the Application using suitable credentials
3. 1.Create a master only event list should be avaialble
2.Include this event list in a package
4. 1.Perform  a reservation transcation for this package
5. 1.Add constituent vents to the event liist mentioned above
2.Perform master event expansion
6. 1.navigate to Ticket Services
2.Select the order mentioned in step 4
7. 1.Click the pencil icon against the package line 
2.select 'claim' from drop down
3.select only few seats
4.Click APPLY ACTION and get navigated to cart
5.select delivery method
6.Make payment and complete Transcation
8. 1.navigate to Ticket Services
2.Select the order mentioned above
3.Select the option 'Exchange' from 'Select Action' drop down
4.select ALL reserved ticket (Note the reserved tickets count)
5.DO NOT select any sold  tickets
6.Click APPLY ACTION
9. 1.search for the packages
2.select any package
10. 1.Enter the seat Request (number of tickets to be purchased)
2.Click BEST AVAILABLE
11. Note  the seats available  in cart
12. 1.Select delivery method for new tickets
2.Make payment and complete the Transaction
13. 1.navigate to Ticket Services
2.select the order mentioned above
3.Verify the seats in the order
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. PV Application should be launched successfully
2. Login should be successful
3. A package should be avaialble with master only event list
4. Reservation transcation should be completed for the package mentioned above.

Note down the correponding Order details
5. Orders completed above should get expanded successfully.

Seats should be locked for the constituent events also in this order
6. Order details page should be displayed to the user.

This order should now have seats of master event and constituent event
7. Partial claim should be successful.

The order should now contain sold as well as reserved tickets

# of sold tickets and # of reserved tickets should be noted down
8. User should be navigated to page where he can select the package with which he wishes to exchange the seats.

The # of returned tickets displayed should be same as the # of reserved tickets
9. User should be navigated to the cart.

The # of returned tickets displayed should be same as the # of sold tickets
10. User should be navigated successfully to cart.

User should not be navigated back to the beginning of exchange flow page
11. Cart should contain seats of for Exchange Reservation

Also cart should contain seats for Exchange Release
12. Transcation should be completed successfully
13. The seats released during exchange transcation should not be available. Instead the new tickets reserved during exchange transcation should be available.

Also all  the sold  tickets in the order should remain unaffected

Select a Patron. 
Select "Same Seat" as the seat type option
Input the seats such that all the Events under Package have the same seat.
Reserve the above seats.
Complete transaction.
3. Navigate to Ticket Services.
Select the above transaction.
Peform partial claim by selecting few seats in the Package.
Click Apply Action
4. Select Delivery method and Payment method.
Complete transaction.
5. Navigate to Ticket Services.
Select the above transaction(step 5).
Select Action as 'Exchange' .
Select 1 Event seat each for Claimed and Reserved seats.
Click Apply Action
6. Verify  if user is prompted to exchange seats for both Claimed and Reserved seats depending on the number of Events in Package Event list.
7. Select Delivery method and Payment method.
Complete transaction.
8. Call
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. The Package must be created.
2. The seats must be reserved and transaction must be completed.
3. The seats must be selected for Partial claim.
USer must be navigated to Tickets cart.
4. The partial claim transaction must be completed.
5. The seats must be selected for Exchange transaction
6. user should be prompted twice(since there are both claimed and reserved seats) to exchange for another package and there should only be 1 offer in the cart.
Separate offers must be shown for Claimed and Reserved seats
7. The Exchange transaction on Claimed and reserved seats must be completed.
8.

title: Exchange seats of a Package Reservation Order which was created along with Cash Receipt action for another Package Receivable order

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Launch PV Application using the link provided
2. Login to the Application using suitable credentials
3. 1.Navigate to Ticket Sales
2.select any patron
3.Select seats of any package and navigate to cart
4.Assigna delivery method
5.Navigate to Receivables tab
6.Create a Receivable for this transaction
7.CHECKOUT the transcation
4. 1.Navigate to Ticket Services
2.Select the option 'Order ID' for the dropdown 'Search Using'
3.Enter the Transcation ID noted above as 'Search Value'
4.Select the Radio button 'Order'
5.Click FIND
5. Click CASH RECEIPT
6. 1.Enter the amounts you are planning to pay for these Receivable in the 'Amount' Text box against these Receivables 
2.select a Note type and enter note
3.Click APPLY
7. 1.Navigate to Payment tab
8. 1.Select the payment method
2.Click ACCEPT PAYMENT
9. 1.Click ADD OFFER
2.Select any package
3.Select seats for this package and navigate to cart
10. Click CHECKOUT
11. 1.Navigate to Ticket Services
2.Select the option 'Order ID' for the dropdown 'Search Using'
3.Enter the Transcation ID noted n previous step as 'Search Value'
4.Select the Radio button 'Order'
5.Click FIND
12. Click the Order ID link for the new package order craeted in step 9
13. 1.Select the option 'Exchange' from the 'Select Action' drop down
2.Select all seats of this order
3.Click APPLY ACTION
14. 1.Select any package with which you wish to exchange the seats and get navigated to the seat selection page
2.Select seats of this package
3.Assign a Delivery method
4.Make Payment and complete the Transcation
15. 1.Click the 'Reserve' link for the new Package offer in cart
2.Select a future date for the 'Reserve Until' value for this new offer
3.Click the option 'SET TO RESERVATION'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. PV Application should be launched successfully
2. Login should be successful
3. Transcation should be completed succesfully with Receivable for the package.

Note down the Transaction ID
4. The Order Details corresponding to this transaction should be displayed
5. User should be navigated to the Receivables tab cart.

User should be now in the sub tab 'Pay' under the Rceivables tab.
6. The Balance amount for these Receivable should get updated accordingly
7. The amounts mentioned in previous step (the amounts entered in the 'Amount' tab under the Receivable tab) should be displayed as the Amount to be paid
8. Payment should be successful
9. User should be navigated to the cart successfully.

The cart should contain the CASH RECEIPT and the new package offer.
Cart Balance should be updated accordingly
10. The Transaction should be completed succesfully
11. The two orders corresponding to this transcation should be displayed as search result as two differnt lines
12. User should be navigated to the details page for this new package order with Receivables
13. User should be navigated to the page where he can selecte seats of any event/package with which he wish to exchange the seats

No unexpected Error should be displayed.
14. Exchange Transaction should be completed successfully
15. The new Package offer added in  the cart should be changed to a Reservation offer

title: Verify exchange of tickets of a closed batch closed through multiple batch closing

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. 1. Launch PV application.
2. Login using valid credentials.
2. Select Batch Printing from the Ticketing tab.
3. Select Ticket sales from the Ticketing tab.
4. 1.Select one event for sale.
2.Set one patron by searching
3.Select a Delivery Method.
4. Make the Payment.
5.Check out from the Cart
5. 1. Create a Batch job such that it includes the Tickets of Step 3.
2. Lock batch and print the tickets.
6. 1.select Ticket service from drop down.
2.Search for transaction by giving transaction id got from Step 3
7. 1.Select Action as 'Exchange'
2.Select All the Tickets
3.Click on Apply Action
8. 1.Select the Tickets for the new event 
2.Select any delivery method  ,add the required fields for that and Click Apply
3.Select any payment method  ,add the required fields for that and click Apply Payment
9. 1.Open the Ticket services
2.Search for the transaction by entering the Transaction id got from Step 3.
10. Close tha batch of step 5 together with the other batches.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. The login should be successful and the 'Home' page of the application should be displayed.
2. Batch Printing page should be displayed.
3. Ticket sales page should be displayed
4. The Transaction should be successfully completed and Transaction ID should be noted

 1. Click on the 'Capacity Control' tab.

title: Verify that Maintain patron is  returning the self-service print permission

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Pre-requisite:

1.Set MYTICKETS_FORWARD_TICKETS_ENABLED (MTFTE) textcode as true at supplier level
2.A patron who has forward tickets permission should be available
3.The patron should have tickets that are enabled for Forward action in inventory
4.The patron should have a friend in Friend List who has only one account assoicated with the email ID
2. Login to Mytickets account of the patron mentioned in pre-requisite 2
3. Navigate to Inventory page and select Forward Tickets action
4. Select tickets available for forward action and assign them to the friend mentioed in Pre-requsite 4
5. Click on Continue button on Inventory page
6. Click on Forward Tickets button on Review modal
7. Click on Mytickets button on Confirmation modal
8. Verify forwarded tickets' status has been changed to 'Forwarded :
9. Logout from Mytickets
10. Verify the recipient has received FTREESUB/FTREEMSG email
11. Click on the Mytickets link in the email
12. Verify the email address is pre-populated in the form with the email address to which the forwarded ticket is sent
13. Complete account creation and verify that BOTS patron id is displayed
14. Verify, upon creating the account, the ticket is automatically be added to the patron's inventory
15. Verify the ticket is marked as a forwarded ticket and have a status marker indicating the name of the forwarding (sending) patron
16. . a. Verify in Maintain patron API is  returning the self-service print permission- It should have the self service print permission
      b. Logout and login to the same patron above and verify the find patron api call.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Pre-requisite should be met
2. Patron is logged into Mytickets account
3. Friends List is displayed
4. 1.Friend's name is displayed against the ticket with a remove icon
2.#Ticket of friend is updated with the number of tickets assigned to that friend
5. Forward Review modal is displayed
6. Confirmation modal window is displayed
7. Inventory page is displayed
8. Forwarded tickets' status has been changed to 'Forwarded :
9. Patron is logged out
10. The recipient has received FTREESUB/FTREEMSG email
11. Patron is directed to a MyTickets account creation form
12. The email address is pre-populated in the form with the email address to which the forwarded ticket is sent
13. Account has been successfully created
14. Upon creating the account, the ticket is automatically be added to the patron's inventory
15. The ticket is marked as a forwarded ticket and have a status marker indicating the name of the forwarding (sending) patron
16. a. It should be returning the self-service print permission
b. it should include the find patron api response with self-service print permission

2. Create Bundle Package( include inventory and non Inventory events) with 2 non-primary lists, where there are at least 2 bundle buyer types.
3. Buyer type 1 & 2 should be associated the Same Promotion ( promo 1)
4 Both promotions should point to the Same Package.
2. Launch PVNG using the Following Credentials.



3. Ticket Sale
1. Enter the Primary Event Name which was created above
2. Lock and sell 2 tickets for buyer 1 (promo 1) and 2 tickets for buyer 3 ( promo 2),click on add offer and select primary event of bundle package2, lock and sell 2 tickets for buyer 4 (promo 1) and 2 tickets for buyer 6 ( promo 2)
3.Click on Check Out
4. Click on Transaction ID
4. 1. Click on "Action" tab
2.Select re price from action dropdown and select multiple tickets (one ticket for Buyertype1,one ticket for buyer type 3 from bundle package1 and one ticket for Buyertype 4,one ticket for buyer type 6 from bundle package2)with a  combination of buyer types relating to different bundle promotions of  different bundle, click on Apply action.
3.Verify the re price amount ,complete the transaction.
4.Verify  bundle package groupings for a re price transaction of multiple tickets with a combination of buyer types relating to different bundle promotions of the different bundle
5. Verify inventoried and non inventoried tickets count is displayed correctly.
6. Click on Log off
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Pre-requisite should be successful
2. The application should be launched
3. 1. User should be able to complete sale Transaction for the different bundle packages
2.In Ticket Services Order/Transaction/Delivery details, multiple bundle promotion buyer types that belong to the same bundle package will be grouped in the same band.
3. All secondary tickets allocated to this bundle should display correctly
4. User should able to re price multiple tickets with a  combination of buyer types relating to different bundle promotions of the different bundle along with non -inventoried ticket.
5. Inventoried and non inventoried tickets count should displayed correctly.
Inventoried tickets should be 2.
non inventoried(2 pels together ) should have 4 Tickets for bundle package1.
Inventoried tickets should be 2.
non inventoried(2 pels together ) should have 4 Tickets for bundle package2
6. User able to Log off the Application

title: Verify  bundle package groupings for  Claiming  reservation with a  combination of buyer types relating to bundle and non-bundle promotions

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. 1. Create 1 Promotion
2. Create Bundle Package( include inventory and non Inventory events) with 2 non-primary lists, where there are at least 2 bundle buyer types.
3. Buyer type 1 & 2 should be associated the Same Promotion ( promo 1)
4 Both promotions should point to the Same Package.
2. Launch PVNG using the Following Credentials.



3. Ticket Sale
1. Enter the Primary Event Name which was created above
2. Lock and sell 2 tickets for buyer 1 (promo 1) and 2 tickets for non- bundle buyer type (eg:adult) 
3.reserve the tickets and Click on Check Out
4. Click on Transaction ID
4. 1. Click on "Action" tab
2.Select claim reservation from action dropdown and select single ticket with buyer type of bundle promotion, and one ticket of non- bundle buyer type,click on Apply action.
3.Verify the return amount ,complete the transaction.
5. Verify inventoried and non inventoried tickets count is displayed correctly.
6. Click on Log off
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Pre-requisite should be successful
2. The application should be launched
3. 1. User should be able to complete sale Transaction for the bundle package

2. In Ticket Services Order/Transaction/Delivery details, multiple promotion buyer types that belong to the same bundle package will be grouped in the same band.
3. All secondary tickets allocated to this bundle should display correctly
4. In the cart, an offer will group the tickets according to:
Non-bundle promotion buyer types at the top (sorted alphabetically)
Bundle promotion buyer types of the same bundle (sorted alphabetically)
All secondary tickets allocated for this bundle
5. Inventoried and non inventoried tickets count should displayed correctly.
Inon- bundle buyer type tickets should be 1
nventoried tickets should be 1.
non inventoried(2 pels together ) should have 2 Tickets.
6. User able to Log off the Application

6. User able to Log off the Application

title: Verify  bundle package groupings for  Releasing reservation with a  combination of buyer types relating to bundle and non-bundle promotions

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. 1. Create 1 Promotion
2. Create Bundle Package( include 1 inventory and 2 non Inventory events) with 2 non-primary lists, where there are at least 2 bundle buyer types.
3. Buyer type 1  should be associated the Same Promotion ( promo 1)
4 Both promotions should point to the Same Package.
5.Include standard, non-promo buyer type(normal Adult) .
2. Launch PVNG using the Following Credentials.



3. Ticket Sale
1. Enter the Primary Event Name which was created above
2. Lock and Reserve 2 tickets for buyer 1 (promo 1) and 2 tickets for non- bundle buyer type (eg:adult) 
3.Click on Check Out
4. Click on Transaction ID
4. 1. Click on "Action" tab
2.Select Release from action dropdown and select single ticket with buyer type of bundle promotion, and one ticket of non- bundle buyer type,click on Apply action.
3.Verify the return amount ,complete the transaction.
5. Verify inventoried and non inventoried tickets count is displayed correctly.
6. Click on Log off
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. Pre-requisite should be successful
2. The application should be launched
3. 1. User should be able to complete Reservation Transaction for the bundle package

2. In Ticket Services Order/Transaction/Delivery details, multiple promotion buyer types that belong to the same bundle package will be grouped in the same band.
3. All secondary tickets allocated to this bundle should display correctly
4. In the cart, an offer will group the tickets according to:
Non-bundle promotion buyer types at the top (sorted alphabetically)
Bundle promotion buyer types of the same bundle (sorted alphabetically)
All secondary tickets allocated for this bundle
5. Inventoried and non inventoried tickets count should displayed correctly.
Inon- bundle buyer type tickets should be 1
nventoried tickets should be 1.
non inventoried(2 pels together ) should have 2 Tickets.
6. User able to Log off the Application
